mapper.sql: id, p_ip, code, room_name, room_id, p_location, p_status, update_time, start_time, end_time, is_black, p_remark
mapper.select:
select
from tb_pad where 1 = 1
and CONCAT(IFNULL(`room_name`,''), IFNULL(`p_location`,'')) like CONCAT('%', #{key}, '%')
mapper.insert: insert into tb_pad (id, p_ip, code, room_name, room_id, p_location, p_status, update_time, start_time, end_time, p_remark) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roomName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roomId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

id,
p_ip,
code,
room_name,
room_id,
p_location,
p_status,
update_time,

end_time,

mapper.update:
update tb_pad
p_ip = #{pIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
room_name = #{roomName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
room_id = #{roomId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
p_location = #{pLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
p_status = #{pStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_black = #{isBlack,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
p_remark = #{pRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
